name: Disable All Updates & Notifications
author: Expertwolf

sections.description:
This plugin is used disable the wordpress functionality of updating core, themes & plugins automatically. Also it will disable all kind of update notification from wordpress.org theme/plugin repository.

Features
* Disable WordPress core, themes, plugin update
* Disable notifications for all updates available.
sections.installation:
Automation Installation
1. Plugin->Add New->Search for “disable all updates”
2. Download, install, and activate the plugin.

Manual Installation
1. Download Disable All Updates & Notifications.
2. Upload the plugin directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
3. Activate this plugin from your plugins page.
sections.faq:
Problem after activating?

Deactivate through plugin page or ftp/file manager by simply deleting folder named “disable-all-updates” inside (/wp-content/plugins) & Report on support.

Need to update something?

Deactivate plugin temporarily (to check updates & do updates) and activate plugin again.

short_description: Disable Wordpress, Themes & Plugins Updates along with their update notifications.
